short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A Fun Game of Space Invaders

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
A free offline version of space invaders that you can pop up and play anywhere, anytime without any ads.

To play the game:
1. install the extension
2. click on the extension from the extensions tab
3. enjoy the game
